players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Suspicious behavior, Charlie. Think twice before acting."
Bob: "Thanks Alice, I noticed Diana's behavior too. Any leads?"
Charlie: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice. I'm investigating her."
Bob: "Noted Charlie, I'll watch Alice. Any info on Diana's death?"
Charlie: "Bob, Alice's recent actions are suspicious. Keep close watch."
You: "Charlie, your investigation is on the right track. Be cautious."

Alice was arrested
